00037 bool V1724Board::GetBoardMemory( UINT32 &num_ksamples_per_channel)
00038 {
00039         UINT32 reg_value32= 0;
00040 
00041         // 
00042         // read the board id
00043         if( !cvt_read( this->m_p_data, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_ADD, &reg_value32, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_AM, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_DATA_SIZE))
00044         {
00045                 return false;
00046         }
00047         num_ksamples_per_channel= CVT_V1724_GET_BRDINF_BLOCK_SIZE_KW( reg_value32);
00048         num_ksamples_per_channel*= 2;           // 14 bit data
00049         return true;
00050 }
